title: Dawn Crystal FTB Adventure 2 Time to mine
author: tony300300
txt_content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jjIrJNck3DY
有建议可以直接说。这次是第2次！
MCBBS moderator-tony300300(Dawn Crystal) start his adventure in this brand new minecraft world. Comments are welcome.
每个星期6十点钟新一集会自动出现！
10Pm every saturday, New Eposide!
please sub my channel and my personal page in youtube
https://www.facebook.com/mcbbsdawncrystal
